name: What Lurks in the Mist (Alpha)
description:
Platform game built by Dane Muller & Duy Phan as a final project for our first game development class at Academy of Art University. We are going to be continuing this project over the winter break and showcasing the final build at the spring show next year. You can find a video play through and more information about the game on my portfolio website SomethingDoodled.com.

As we consider this to be an alpha build all feedback is encouraged and welcomed. Thanks!
